revised_title: Intensities of Vibration Bands in Nitrous Oxide
tldr: The authors determined the absolute intensity of the vibration absorption band of nitrous oxide by measuring the integrated band area under conditions of complete pressure broadening caused by adding excess nitrogen. They correlated the intensity with the polar properties of the nitrogen-nitrogen and nitrogen-oxygen links and discussed the general relationship between integrated band area and total pressure. This study provides more information about the relationships involved when nitrous oxide's vibration bands are pressure-broadened by adding gases like nitrogen.
